description:
Sunraku and the others gather to take a look back at past events to get viewers refreshed and up to date before their battle with Wethermon the Tombguard.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Special Bonus Episode: Get Yourselves Caught Up with This Light-Speed Recap!
Special Tokuban: Saishin Wa made Maruwakari! Chousoku Digest
スペシャル特番 最新話まで丸わかり! 超速ダイジェスト
